snippet: Extremists on both sides of the drug-policy issue have taken over the conversation. We must give centrists a voice, or America’s drug problem will only get worse.
abstract: Op-Ed article by former White House drug policy adviser Kevin A Sabet argues that extremists on both sides of the drug-policy issues have taken over the conversation at precisely the wrong time; argues that those who champion a new range of cost-effective, evidence-based approaches to prevention, treatment and justice system need to be taken seriously or else America's drug problem will only get worse.
lead_paragraph: Extremists on both sides of the drug-policy issue have taken over the conversation. We must give centrists a voice, or America’s drug problem will only get worse.
